mapper.select: SELECT application_acronym, custodian_number, application_name, application_description, application_object_prefix, enabled_ind, distribute_type_cd, management_enabled_ind, application_version, reported_webade_version FROM application WHERE application_acronym = #{acronym}
SELECT a.action_name, a.privileged_ind, al.role_name FROM action a JOIN action_lnk al ON a.action_name = al.action_name WHERE a.application_acronym = :acronym
SELECT role_name, application_acronym, role_definition, oracle_role FROM application_role WHERE application_acronym = :acronym

SELECT preference_id, preference_type_code, preference_sub_type, application_acronym, preference_set_name, preference_name, preference_value, created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date, revision_count, euser_id, preference_description, preference_data_type_code, sensitive_data_ind WHERE application_acronym = :acronym

SELECT role_name, application_acronym, db_userid, db_password, db_driver, connection_info, min_connections, max_connections, max_connection_idle_time, max_connection_wait_time, monitor_sleep_time, pool_connections_ind, ping_connections_ind WHERE application_acronym = :acronym
